name: sd-checkout-code
command: echo Cloning github.com/screwdriver-cd/guide, on branch branchName && if [ ! -z $SCM_CLONE_TYPE ] && [ $SCM_CLONE_TYPE = ssh ]; then export SCM_URL=git@github.com:screwdriver-cd/guide; elif [ ! -z $SCM_USERNAME ] && [ ! -z $SCM_ACCESS_TOKEN ]; then export SCM_URL=https://$SCM_USERNAME:$SCM_ACCESS_TOKEN@github.com/screwdriver-cd/guide; else export SCM_URL=https://github.com/screwdriver-cd/guide; fi && sd-step exec core/git "git clone --quiet --progress --branch branchName $SCM_URL $SD_SOURCE_DIR" && sd-step exec core/git "git reset --hard branchName" && echo Reset to branchName && echo Setting user name and user email && sd-step exec core/git "git config user.name sd-buildbot" && sd-step exec core/git "git config user.email dev-null@screwdriver.cd" && export GIT_URL=$SCM_URL.git && echo Fetching PR and merging with branchName && sd-step exec core/git "git fetch origin pull/3/head:pr" && sd-step exec core/git "git merge --no-edit 12345" && export GIT_BRANCH=origin/refs/pull/3/head:pr
